attributes.action: Truss and Kwarteng are accountable to no-one. The system needs to change.
attributes.additional_details: Truss & Kwarteng are being reckless with our economy which is in a fragile state already. They were not voted for by us, the people, they are ignoring advice & warnings from the IMF, world & UK banks and their own peers. They must be held accountable. We are owed a general election. We cannot be subjected to more of this recklessness, risk, concern, worry, stress or woe.
attributes.background: Politicians or those that are able to must step in and submit a vote of no confidence. Forget the embarrassment this may cause (so soon after Boris was outed). Our economy is at risk. Or, a general election must be held. The people did not vote for this, so why are we all feeling the effects of it?

rejection.details:
We think your ask is already covered by a petition we currently have open:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
